scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "build-client,build-server" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn workspace client build" "yarn workspace server build"
scripts.lint: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "lint-client,lint-server" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn workspace client lint" "yarn workspace server lint"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -p "[{name}]" -n "test-client,test-server" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "yarn workspace client test" "yarn workspace server test"
